Top level piece of glue for Policy gradient, link the controller and the simulator

Parameters:
Controller 
Simulator (problem specific)
discount factor [0, 1]. If 1, trace must be reset occasionally or have 0 mean reward.

Do a fixed number of individual steps, aggregating the reward. No output is done. Could also be termed an "epoch"

Parameters:
empty vector to accumulate average reward for each reward dimension

double libpg::GOALPomdp::doSingleEpisode ( Vector &  totalRewards,
bool  learn 
)

Do as many steps as required to get to the goal for the first time. Assumes simulator has been reset. EpisodeSteps will be reset to 0.

Parameters:
empty vector to accumulate average reward for each reward dimension
should learning be turned on, or are we just exploiting/evaluating the current policy?
Returns:
average reward. Can also query class for episodeSteps
